definition: to set up/to arrange/to establish/to found/to display
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: Run time and designer licenses are included in all three editions.
sentences.chinese: 这三个版本中都包含运行时和设计者许可证。

sentences.english: This project will go up in flames if the designer quits.
sentences.chinese: 如果设计者放弃，这个项目就会完全失败。

sentences.english: Designers shows us the beauty of the every-day in “snapshot”.
sentences.chinese: 设计者通过“快照”向我们展示了日常生活中的美。

sentences.english: Just to make matters more complex, designers referred to this as the "gate length."
sentences.chinese: 为了使事件更复杂，设计者把它称为“闸长度”。

sentences.english: Some designers are trying to sandwich tradition and technology.
sentences.chinese: 一些设计者试图居于传统和技术之间。

sentences.english: David Pye's work contains elements of the designer and craftsman.
sentences.chinese: 大卫派伊的工作包含了设计者和工匠的元素。

sentences.english: The zebra pattern chairs which brings up the uniqueness and effort of the designer.
sentences.chinese: 斑马条纹的高背椅带出设计者的用心及创意。

sentences.english: We'll actually go out and find the animators and the developers to build that piece of animation.
sentences.chinese: 我们也有设计者和开发者来共同制作动画。

sentences.english: A lot of designers seem to be talking about user experience (UX) these days.
sentences.chinese: 这几天来好多设计者似乎都在讨论用户体验。

sentences.english: A stark word of warning for self-satisfied designers everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 这是对那些自鸣得意的设计者的警告。

sentences.english: Steven Speilberg was part of the original creative team thatdesigned Islands of Adventure.
sentences.chinese: 斯皮尔伯格是这个冒险公园的最初设计者之一。

sentences.english: This should be what naval architects and ship operators go in for.
sentences.chinese: 这是船舶设计者和船舶营运者应该追求的目标。

sentences.english: MVRDV pays more attention to the extension of the designer's personality.
sentences.chinese: MVRDV的建筑会更注重设计者个性的延伸。

sentences.english: Planners also intend to remove some smaller commercial buildings around the lake.
sentences.chinese: 设计者还打算把一些较矮的商业建筑搬离湖畔。

sentences.english: Jay Wilson - That makes it difficult for a game designer.
sentences.chinese: 这对游戏设计者的设计造成了困难。

sentences.english: Therefore, any decorates will and emotion must be able to pour a designer in.
sentences.chinese: 因此，任何装饰都必定会注入设计者的意志和情感。

definition: original and ingenious (idiom)/to show great creativity
original and ingenious (idiom)/to show great creativity
Pei Ieoh Ming or I.M. Pei (1917-2019), Chinese-American architect
to design/to plot/to plan out/to compose/to draw a mental sketch/conception/plan/idea/composition
to display originality (idiom); to do things differently
